name: Unreal Engine
description: Very realistic and detailed 3D.

name: Vray
description: 3D rendering best for objects, landscape and building.

name: Full HD
description: 1920x1080 resolution, commonly used for desktop wallpapers and YouTube videos.

name: 4K Ultra HD
description: 3840x2160 resolution, ideal for high-resolution displays and video production.

name: 720p HD
description: 1280x720 resolution, commonly used for HD video streaming and gaming.

name: 1080p Full HD
description: 1920x1080 resolution, commonly used for high-definition video production and playback.

name: 1440p Quad HD
description: 2560x1440 resolution, ideal for gaming, editing, and design work on high-resolution monitors.

name: 8K Ultra HD
description: 7680x4320 resolution, the highest resolution currently available for consumer-grade displays.

name: Instagram
description: 1080x1080 resolution, commonly used for Instagram photos and stories.

name: Square
description: A resolution of equal width and height, commonly used for social media posts and profile pictures.

name: Portrait
description: Vertical orientation with a resolution typically used for portraits and mobile screens.

name: Landscape
description: Horizontal orientation with a resolution typically used for landscapes, banners, and websites.

name: 5K
description: 5120x2880 resolution, ideal for large displays and high-resolution photo and video editing.

name: Ultra-wide
description: A resolution with an aspect ratio wider than 16:9, commonly used for gaming, video editing, and multitasking.

name: Cinemascope
description: A widescreen resolution with an aspect ratio of 2.35:1, commonly used for movies and video production.

name: Square Instagram
description: 1080x1080 resolution, specifically optimized for Instagram square posts.

name: Pinterest
description: 1000x1500 resolution, commonly used for Pinterest pins.

name: WXGA
description: 1280x800 resolution, commonly used for widescreen computer monitors and laptops.

name: SXGA
description: 1280x1024 resolution, commonly used for computer monitors and gaming displays.

name: QXGA
description: 2048x1536 resolution, commonly used for computer monitors and graphic design work.

name: Ultrawide QHD
description: 3440x1440 resolution, a widescreen resolution commonly used for gaming and video editing.

name: Snapchat
description: 1080x1920 resolution, specifically optimized for Snapchat photos and videos.
